Name: Pavan WLA
AboutMe:
I am working as Middleware Architect, Working at Virtusa for Telecom domain projects. Worked as WebLogic Administrator over 6 years. I have more than 15 years of experience in IT, Worked as technical support team member at BirlaSoft Inc. earlier I had numerous administration and programming related roles at IBM (India), Telepardigm including Java Developer, and Designing with UML.

On the other hand, I had worked as Asst. Professor at Anwarul Uloom College for Computer Studies. I did Masters of Computer Application**s (MCA) from Osmania University, Hyderabad, India, and **M.Tech (IT) from Punjabi University, Patiyala.

In free time happy to assist, train online/in place few weekend schedules for new enthusiast for Python, Shell scripting, WebLogic, Tomcat, Apache HTTP Server, WebSphere Administration
